subject: update(skills): balance Core and Development categories with new entries
body:
Add Requirements Engineering, Technical Documentation, Product
Demonstrations, and Process Optimisation to Core (4 → 8). Add Node.js,
Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Git / CI/CD to Development (6 → 10). Brings
both categories in line with Data & Integration (10) for a balanced
presentation.

Tags: content, skills
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-polish
Semver: patch
